item.title: Ok tell me what ya think plz?
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

Hey arr0w, you missed a few things ;). Here i fixed it up to make it use SRL:

[php]
program autoalcher;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

const
itemcolor= 0; //color of item being alched

procedure Alch;
begin
if(not(gametab(7))) then
gametab(7);
wait(1000 + random(700));
MMouse(711,327,3,3t,rue);
Mouse(711,327,3,3,true);
wait(1000+random(500));
Mouse(711,327,3,3,true);
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
repeat
Alch;
until(false)
end.[/php]

Read full topic

item.title: Ok tell me what ya think plz?
item.dc:creator: @arr0w Arr0w
item.description:
@arr0w wrote:

Here i fxied it for you.

program autoalcher;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
 
const
itemcolor= 0; //color of item being alched

procedure Alch; 
begin
  if(not(gametab(7))) then
  gametab(7);
  wait(1000 + random(700));
  movemousesmooth(711,327,true);
  clickmouse(711,327,true);
  wait(1000+random(500));
  clickmouse(711,327,true);
end;  

begin
repeat
  Alch;
until(false)
end.

there was quite a bit of mistakes.

item.title: Ok tell me what ya think plz?
item.dc:creator: @buckleyindahouse buckleyindahouse
item.description:
@buckleyindahouse wrote:

now this is my first script. tell me what you think. I did this based on other ppls scripts. not stealing them but looking at how they code and somethings like that.

[scar]program autoalcher;

{.include/sr/srl}

const
itemcolor= //color of item being alched

begin
if(not(gametab(7))) then
gametab(7);
wait(1000 + random(700));
movemousesmooth(711,327:true);
clickmouse(711,327:true);
wait(1000+random(500));
clickmouse(711,327:true);
end;
end.[/scar]
